extendedInfo.description: Notice:  This app has recently been upgraded.  Returning users may need to reinstall.Welcome to The Fort Wayne Garage Sales application, your trusted source for finding local garage sales.Hunting down and mapping out routes for garage sales can be time consuming and frustrating:  either outdated information, or no local listings.  But with the Garage Sales application from The Ft. Wayne Journal Gazette and News Sentinel you can save time by searching current, local ads on the go.  Itâs the easiest and most reliable way to find garage sales near you.Search and Save by keywords, open days and times, and proximity to your location.  View detailed information, even pictures.   Set up alerts to be notified when new garage sales featuring your preferences come up.  Map out your shopping strategy so you can be first to get the good deals.  Make a weekend of treasure hunting in your area, with the Garage Sales application from The Ft. Wayne Journal Gazette and News Sentinel in hand!Keywords: garage sale, yard sale, rummage sale, tag sale, estate sale, map, mapping, classified, local sale, craigslist, newspaper, shopping, free, finder, craigs list, garagesaleapps, treasure map, flea market, Fort Wayne, Indiana

reviews.title: Never changed
reviews.comment: Garage sales stay the old ones from when I downloaded they never updated from week to week.
reviews.author: AMY Medsker

reviews.title: Doesnt work
reviews.comment: It showed me where the salvation army is not garage sales. Never updates. This app is horrible. I deleted it.
reviews.author: Jamie Anderson
